p: Epidemiological data on syphilis prevalence is critical for developing public health strategies towards syphilis prevention, care and treatment. Our study site is one of the largest illicit drug distribution centers of China, and the largest autonomous prefecture of Yi nationality. Frequent casual sexual behavior is more tolerable among Yi people, which is related to an increased risk of T. pallidum infection [ 8]. In this region there are few female commercial sex workers and men who have sex with men among the Yi people [ 9]. In the current report, we aimed to determine the prevalence and factors associated with T. pallidum infection among local residents, mainly Yi people, in this region.
